description.zh-cn: 位于欧洲西北部的构成国，是荷兰王国的主要组成部分。
description.en: A constituent country located in Northwestern Europe, the main component of the Kingdom of the Netherlands.

description.zh-cn: 由荷兰、阿鲁巴、库拉索和荷属圣马丁组成的君主立宪制国家。
description.en: A constitutional monarchy composed of the Netherlands, Aruba, Curaçao, and Sint Maarten.

description.zh-cn: 现任荷兰国王。
description.en: The current King of the Netherlands.

description.zh-cn: 现任荷兰首相。
description.en: The current Prime Minister of the Netherlands.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，在16至17世纪统治荷兰地区，并与其进行了八十年战争。
description.en: A European country that ruled the Netherlands region in the 16th and 17th centuries and fought the Eighty Years' War with it.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰各省反抗西班牙统治的独立战争。
description.en: The war of independence fought by the Dutch provinces against Spanish rule.

description.zh-cn: 由荷兰北方七省组成的联盟，被视为现代荷兰的开端。
description.en: A union of the northern seven provinces of the Netherlands, considered the beginning of the modern Netherlands.

description.zh-cn: 由荷兰北方七省组成的联邦共和国，是现代荷兰的前身。
description.en: A federal republic of the northern seven provinces of the Netherlands, the predecessor of the modern Netherlands.

description.zh-cn: 结束八十年战争的条约，西班牙正式承认尼德兰七省共和国的独立。
description.en: The treaty that ended the Eighty Years' War, in which Spain formally recognized the independence of the Dutch Republic.

description.zh-cn: 由拿破仑建立的帝国，曾于1795年占领荷兰。
description.en: An empire established by Napoleon, which occupied the Netherlands in 1795.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第一帝国皇帝，在荷兰扶植了巴达维亚共和国和荷兰王国（傀儡国）。
description.en: Emperor of the First French Empire, who established the Batavian Republic and the Kingdom of Holland (a client state) in the Netherlands.

description.zh-cn: 在法国占领荷兰后建立的傀儡共和国。
description.en: A client republic established after the French occupation of the Netherlands.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑战争后由荷兰、比利时和卢森堡组成的王国。
description.en: A kingdom formed by the Netherlands, Belgium, and Luxembourg after the Napoleonic Wars.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，曾是荷兰联合王国的一部分，后于1830年独立。
description.en: A European country, formerly part of the United Kingdom of the Netherlands, which became independent in 1830.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次世界大战期间占领荷兰的政权。
description.en: The regime that occupied the Netherlands during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲的政治和经济联盟，荷兰是其创始成员国之一。
description.en: A political and economic union in Europe, of which the Netherlands is a founding member.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲和北美国家为实现防务合作而建立的国际组织，荷兰是其创始成员国之一。
description.en: An international organization established for defense cooperation by European and North American countries, of which the Netherlands is a founding member.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚国家，曾为荷兰殖民地，后于1949年获荷兰承认独立。
description.en: A Southeast Asian country, formerly a Dutch colony, whose independence was recognized by the Netherlands in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 南美洲国家，曾为荷兰殖民地，后于1975年获荷兰承认独立。
description.en: A South American country, formerly a Dutch colony, whose independence was recognized by the Netherlands in 1975.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰是荷兰王国的主要构成国。
description.en: The Netherlands is the main constituent country of the Kingdom of the Netherlands.

description.zh-cn: 自2013年起，威廉-亚历山大担任荷兰的国家元首。
description.en: Since 2013, Willem-Alexander has served as the head of state of the Netherlands.

description.zh-cn: 迪克·斯霍夫是现任荷兰首相。
description.en: Dick Schoof is the current Prime Minister of the Netherlands.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰北方省份为反抗西班牙统治而发动了八十年战争。
description.en: The northern provinces of the Netherlands launched the Eighty Years' War to resist Spanish rule.

description.zh-cn: 西班牙与寻求独立的尼德兰七省共和国进行了长达八十年的战争。
description.en: Spain fought a war lasting eighty years against the Dutch Republic, which was seeking independence.

description.zh-cn: 乌特勒支同盟的成立被视为现代荷兰的开始，并于1581年正式宣布独立，成立尼德兰七省共和国。
description.en: The formation of the Union of Utrecht is considered the beginning of the modern Netherlands, which formally declared independence in 1581, establishing the Dutch Republic.

description.zh-cn: 《明斯特和约》的签订标志着八十年战争的结束，西班牙正式承认尼德兰七省共和国的独立。
description.en: The signing of the Peace of Münster marked the end of the Eighty Years' War, with Spain officially recognizing the independence of the Dutch Republic.

description.zh-cn: 1795年，尼德兰七省共和国被法兰西第一帝国占领，共和国终结。
description.en: In 1795, the Dutch Republic was occupied by the First French Empire, bringing the republic to an end.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑在占领荷兰后，扶植建立了巴达维亚共和国。
description.en: After occupying the Netherlands, Napoleon established the Batavian Republic.

description.zh-cn: 比利时于1830年从荷兰联合王国独立，导致联合王国瓦解。
description.en: Belgium became independent from the United Kingdom of the Netherlands in 1830, leading to the dissolution of the united kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次世界大战期间，纳粹德国于1940年5月至1945年间占领荷兰。
description.en: During World War II, Nazi Germany occupied the Netherlands from May 1940 to 1945.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰是欧洲联盟（其前身为欧洲经济共同体）的创始成员国之一。
description.en: The Netherlands is one of the founding members of the European Union (formerly the European Economic Community).

description.zh-cn: 荷兰是北大西洋公约组织的创始成员国之一。
description.en: The Netherlands is one of the founding members of NATO.

description.zh-cn: 1949年，荷兰承认前殖民地荷属东印度独立为印度尼西亚。
description.en: In 1949, the Netherlands recognized the independence of its former colony, the Dutch East Indies, as Indonesia.

description.zh-cn: 1975年，荷兰承认前殖民地苏里南独立。
description.en: In 1975, the Netherlands recognized the independence of its former colony, Suriname.
